body.description: One A Day Men's 50+ Healthy Advantage Multivitamins offer 100% or more of the Daily Value of at least 15 key nutrients in a single tablet. One A Day Men's 50+ Healthy Advantage is designed to address health concerns of men as they age. This daily multivitamin contains Vitamins A, C, and E, Zinc, Selenium, Copper and Manganese to support cell health.* One A Day Men's 50+ Healthy Advantage is formulated to support:* cell health, heart health, healthy blood pressure**, immune health, physical energy* by helping convert food to fuel, and eye health.* One A Day Men's 50+ Healthy Advantage Multivitamin is free of gluten, wheat, dairy, artificial flavors, and artificial sweeteners. Men over the age of 50 should take one tablet daily with food. One A Day Multivitamins provide nutritional support that you and your family may need at any life stage.Not a replacement for heart medications.**To help support blood pressure levels already within the normal range*This statement has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A scientific exploration of men’s health
reviews.reviewText: Review Body:Product: 2 stars• I have embarked on a scientific exploration of men’s health, thanks to the One A Day Men’s 50+ Multivitamins that I have been taking for several months now.• These multivitamins are specially formulated to provide various vitamins and minerals that support the health and well-being of men over 50 years old.• They also contain no gluten, dairy, or artificial sweeteners that may harm your health or alter your natural taste.• They provide a balanced and complete supplement for your daily needs, ensuring your optimal immune health, bone health, heart health, eye health, and healthy blood pressure.• I personally have had no issues with the taste or size of the tablet, but I know that some people may find them too large or bitter. This is a matter of personal preference, and I don’t think it affects the quality or effectiveness of the product. Besides, a little bitterness is good for the soul, right?Customer Support/Service: 2 stars• I have never had to contact the customer support team of this product, because I have had no issues or complaints with it. That alone is worth giving them two stars, don’t you think? But seriously, after reviewing other posts and their comments concerning customer service, I am confident they earned it. They seem to be prompt, courteous, and helpful whenever someone has a query or a problem with the product.• They also follow up with their customers to make sure they are happy with their purchase and to offer them some tips and advice on how to take the multivitamins properly.• They show a genuine interest and care for their customers and their health, and I appreciate their professionalism and kindness.Shipping: 1 star• The shipping was fast and free as advertised.• The product arrived in excellent condition and was well-packaged and sealed.• I had no issues with the delivery or the product’s quality.• The package did not include any token product or letter from the seller, but I did not expect or need any. I was satisfied with the product itself, and I did not feel the need for any extra perks. I’m not a needy person, after all.Final Written Review:I give this product 5 stars because it is a scientific exploration of men’s health. I have researched the best supplement for men over 50, and I have found that these multivitamins are the best for me. They provide various vitamins and minerals that support my health and well-being, and they have no gluten, dairy, or artificial sweeteners that may harm my health or alter my natural taste. They provide a balanced and complete supplement for my daily needs, ensuring my optimal immune health, bone health, heart health, eye health, and healthy blood pressure. I personally have had no issues with the taste or size of the tablet, but I know that some people may find them too large or bitter. This is a matter of personal preference, and I don’t think it affects the quality or effectiveness of the product. Besides, a little bitterness is good for the soul, right?According to WebMD, taking multivitamins can have many benefits for your health, such as:• Filling the nutritional gaps in your diet, especially if you can’t eat a wide variety of healthy foods, have a poor appetite, or choose not to eat from some food groups.• Preventing or correcting vitamin and mineral deficiencies, especially if you have digestive problems, take medications, or have certain medical conditions that interfere with nutrient absorption.• Boosting your immune system, energy levels, mood, and cognitive function, by providing the essential nutrients that your body needs to function properly.• Reducing the risk of chronic diseases, such as heart disease, cancer, diabetes, and osteoporosis, by providing antioxidants, anti-inflammatory, and bone-building nutrients that protect your cells and tissues from damage and aging.The customer support team for this product was wonderful. I have never had to contact them, because I have had no issues or complaints with the product. That alone is worth giving them two stars, don’t you think? But seriously, after reviewing other posts and their comments concerning customer service, I am confident they earned it. They seem to be prompt, courteous, and helpful whenever someone has a query or a problem with the product. They also follow up with their customers to make sure they are happy with their purchase and to offer them some tips and advice on how to take the multivitamins properly. They show a genuine interest and care for their customers and their health, and I appreciate their professionalism and kindness.The shipping was fast and free as advertised. The product arrived in excellent condition and was well-packaged and sealed. I had no issues with the delivery or the product’s quality. The package did not include any token product or letter from the seller, but I did not expect or need any. I was satisfied with the product itself, and I did not feel the need for any extra perks. I’m not a needy person, after all.I highly recommend this product to anyone who is over 50 or is thinking of getting there. It is a scientific exploration of men’s health. You will not regret it.Thank you for reading my review, and I hope you found it helpful and informative. And to quote a famous scientist, “Be less curious about people and more curious about ideas.”Oh, and I almost forgot to leave you with something really to ponder:• Question: What do you call a multivitamin that is specially formulated for men over 50?• Answer: A senior moment.
